form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-4 ( 901-78) N

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 At UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43-R0079 FEE STAMP 9-1-83 APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION Mail or take to: IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ALIEN REGISTRATION (Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR Name chaw NUI LAU TYPE.) No. A-17195429 Section of Law Date: 10-1-1981 (Leave Blank) (1) My full true and correct name is NUI ChAN LAU (Full true name without abbreviations) (2) I now live at 790. FAIRFIELD CIRCLE PASADENA, C.A. 91106 (Number and street, city, county, state, zip code) (3) I was born on 3-6-1915 in CANTON ChiNA (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (County, province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to (5) Other names I have used are: (Include maiden name) Sex: Male Female (6) My father's name YIU CHAN (7) My mother's maiden name HA NUI CHEUNG (8) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes No (If "Yes", explain fully) (9) Can you read and write English? BEEN To CLASSES AND STUDIED Yes No (10) Can you speak English? WORKED AND LIVED IN U.S.A FOR 121 YEARS. Yes No (11) Can you sign your name in English? Yes No (12) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on 5 ( 69 under the name of No , ChAN Lau (Month) (Day) (Year) at HONOLULU HA on (City) (State) O. A. C (Name of ship, airline or adjustment of status) (13) Since that date I have resided continuously in the United States and continuously in the State of CAL, FORNIA where I now live since 1969 During the last five years I have been physically present in the United States for a total of 150 months. (14) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. FROM To STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) 19.69 PRESENT TIME 790 FAIRFIELD CIRCLE PASADEA. e A (b) 19 19 (c) 19 19 (d) 19 19 (15) (a) Have you been out of the United States since your lawful admission as a permanent resident? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months, no matter how short it was. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER-MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES 1-20-1972 2-28-1972 Konea Air line California 3-4-1976 5-15-76 AS Canada 6-17-1978 8-15-78 China six line California Coloprassics (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months or longer? Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of more than 6 months. NAME OF SHIP OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, Bus DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES (16) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes No If "No," explain: Form N-400 (Rev. 9-1-78) N (1) 67976 H (OVER)
